name: ISO 27001:2022
description: International Standard for Information Security Management Systems (ISMS)

deliverables.title: A.5.9 - Asset Inventory
deliverables.description: Verify asset inventory accuracy and completeness
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: A.5.15 - Access Control Policy
deliverables.description: Test access control policy implementation and enforcement
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%access control%'

deliverables.title: A.5.16 - Identity Management
deliverables.description: Verify identity management processes and unique user identification

deliverables.title: A.5.17 - Authentication Information
deliverables.description: Test authentication mechanism strength and credential management
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%password%'

deliverables.title: A.8.9 - Configuration Management
deliverables.description: Test security configurations against hardening standards
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%misconfiguration%' OR title LIKE '%default%'

deliverables.title: A.8.20 - Network Security
deliverables.description: Verify network security controls including segmentation
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%network%' OR title LIKE '%firewall%'

deliverables.title: A.8.24 - Cryptography
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%'

deliverables.title: A.8.8 - Technical Vulnerability Management
deliverables.description: Test for technical vulnerabilities and patch status
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: A.8.15 - Logging
deliverables.description: Verify security logging and monitoring implementation

deliverables.title: A.8.16 - Monitoring Activities
deliverables.description: Test security monitoring and anomaly detection capabilities

deliverables.title: A.8.26 - Application Security
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' OR title LIKE '%XSS%' OR title LIKE '%injection%'
